title: FiveG
author: FiveG
content: I see ETH to become next blessing in disguise, I remember when it was around $100 people condemned it not to go anywhere within the space of a month interval ETH shuck the price in 500% increase and today is about $1800 let's watch and see ETH will create unbreakable records, channel some useless coins you have to ETH and relax in future.

comments.author: zonefloor
comments.body: Frankly, there is no need for such analyzes to know this. Because just as bitcoin is the king of the crypto money world, ethereum is the prince of the crypto money world. It has proven this with its technology and price. This process will continue as long as Vitalik does not quit the project and they do not face any lawsuits. To see this, we can also support by example that almost every newly released cryptocurrency uses the ethereum network. However, I would advise you not to give investment advice to people in this way.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on June 15, 2023, 07:11:20 PMI see ETH to become next blessing in disguise, I remember when it was around $100 people condemned it not to go anywhere within the space of a month interval ETH shuck the price in 500% increase and today is about $1800 let's watch and see ETH will create unbreakable records, channel some useless coins you have to ETH and relax in future.If this is an investment advice then I will say this is not good enough since it looks as if you are overtly emphasising on the possibility of Ethereum being the next Market gem and for sure we will have to build a good knowledge of the fact that previous market action from the ethereum market have pointed to another direction and anyone looking to invest in ETH should apply a lot of causation and take risk assignment before diving in with both foot. If ethereum did a 500% market movement previously,  there is no guarantee that it that will happen again and if unless on the long term basis.

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on June 15, 2023, 07:11:20 PMI see ETH to become next blessing in disguise, I remember when it was around $100 people condemned it not to go anywhere within the space of a month interval ETH shuck the price in 500% increase and today is about $1800 let's watch and see ETH will create unbreakable records, channel some useless coins you have to ETH and relax in future.If you compared ETH to new projects that are hyped these days, they are even more profitable than this. But if we are talking about long-term investment, ETH is considered as one of the best coins to hold and suitable for such a thing. However, thinking that it grows fast and give us a huge profit, is something you don't need to think of as it is never like that. What is best for this when we are in long-term investment is that we know that it never turns scam, unlike these hyped and new projects.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on June 15, 2023, 07:11:20 PMI see ETH to become next blessing in disguise, I remember when it was around $100 people condemned it not to go anywhere within the space of a month interval ETH shuck the price in 500% increaseI even saw it when it was a lower and good thing that I've bought a few of it. That was one of the best decisions that I've ever had.Quote from: FiveG on June 15, 2023, 07:11:20 PM and today is about $1800 let's watch and see ETH will create unbreakable records, channel some useless coins you have to ETH and relax in future.Well, it's gonna be more than the ATH that it has reached and that's why the price of it is expected to be higher. We don't know how high it will be but people who think that it's a good investment will buy it. And those that don't think it's not a good one will ignore it.

comments.author: Yamifoud
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on June 15, 2023, 07:11:20 PMI see ETH to become next blessing in disguise, I remember when it was around $100 people condemned it not to go anywhere within the space of a month interval ETH shuck the price in 500% increase and today is about $1800 let's watch and see ETH will create unbreakable records, channel some useless coins you have to ETH and relax in future.Perhaps, we can buy more if we really think it was good and profitable. I have some ETH already but this current drop doesn't encourage me to buy more but just waited for the next bull season because I realized that having more ETH is not a good idea rather than having more of Bitcoin. Why? Of course, we know that ETH is also a promising coin but considering how it grow and make recovered (very slowly), we can never expect big returns, unlike Bitcoin. A reason why even if it drops, the buying demand is still low.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Yamifoud on June 15, 2023, 09:25:09 PMQuote from: FiveG on June 15, 2023, 07:11:20 PMI see ETH to become next blessing in disguise, I remember when it was around $100 people condemned it not to go anywhere within the space of a month interval ETH shuck the price in 500% increase and today is about $1800 let's watch and see ETH will create unbreakable records, channel some useless coins you have to ETH and relax in future.Perhaps, we can buy more if we really think it was good and profitable. I have some ETH already but this current drop doesn't encourage me to buy more but just waited for the next bull season because I realized that having more ETH is not a good idea rather than having more of Bitcoin. Why? Of course, we know that ETH is also a promising coin but considering how it grow and make recovered (very slowly), we can never expect big returns, unlike Bitcoin. A reason why even if it drops, the buying demand is still low. Aside from the hype that the ops is trying to get around ethereum,  we can not deny the fact that etheruem is a good coin to hold and considering it current price ethereum a indeed the most suitable to hold after Bitcoin,  but the present market crisis is giving a lot of concern to many of us and making us to rethink whether or not to buy more of those potential coins since we don't know the direction the market is going to take in the next coming days since the market is full of surprises. But if you have to hold for the long term Ethereum'ss current price is the best-discounted price to buy more of the coin for long-term usage.

comments.author: dunfida
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on June 15, 2023, 07:11:20 PMI see ETH to become next blessing in disguise, I remember when it was around $100 people condemned it not to go anywhere within the space of a month interval ETH shuck the price in 500% increase and today is about $1800 let's watch and see ETH will create unbreakable records, channel some useless coins you have to ETH and relax in future.Well, i dont have doubts about ETH considering that smart contracts is really indeed revolutionary but due to high gas fees that even up to now it wasnt really been that being resolved then i wouldnt really be seeing this to be having a huge part or partition on my overall portfolio but well we do have our own opinions because there are really people who do mainly support up this coin or project. Also, it wont really be sitting out on rank #2 in the entire market for nothing.If ever they would really be able to solve out that high gas fees then it would really be surely be staying up next to bitcoin for longer years but if not then i wouldnt really be shocked nor get surprisedif ever this one would be overtaken by something new but its unlikely considering about its demand and recognition then it would really be that hard.ETH is a good one and there's rumors about getting x5 for this upcoming bull run.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on June 15, 2023, 07:11:20 PMI see ETH to become next blessing in disguise, I remember when it was around $100 people condemned it not to go anywhere within the space of a month interval ETH shuck the price in 500% increase and today is about $1800 let's watch and see ETH will create unbreakable records, channel some useless coins you have to ETH and relax in future.ETH is a good coin, and a good idea to hold more.The market is getting more cheaper, you can do DCA now or wait for a more cheaper price as the market becomes more volatile. There’s no doubt about the success of ETH, you just need to timing your buy so you can have more chance of getting more profit, right now I’m waiting for the real bottom of this bear trend.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: There's no need to rub it in.  I was there during the time Ethereum was still an infant when it comes to value but I never expected this to happen. All my altcoins from ERC20 that I claimed and sold for Ethereum were also sold for cash without me thinking about the future. My very mistake and one of my biggest regrets after Bitcoin. All I can do now is just go back to all my records of how much Ethereum I made and wish I could go back to the past.Right now, I am just trying to accumulate as much as I can because like you said Ethereum has more possibility to break records than other new baby coins that are being created in this era. The trust is high for the top altcoin and investors are still buying without any doubts. As long as the demand is high even with their high transaction fees, it can become an asset that won't be sold for a long time. The only question is when but I am willing to wait for what the future brings.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on June 15, 2023, 07:11:20 PMI see ETH to become next blessing in disguise, I remember when it was around $100 people condemned it not to go anywhere within the space of a month interval ETH shuck the price in 500% increase and today is about $1800 let's watch and see ETH will create unbreakable records, channel some useless coins you have to ETH and relax in future.Is your analysis of really "it mooned before it will moon again"? Is that really the only reason for it to moon? How about the fundamentals of it and why those other coins useless? Because they didn't moon.I see this kind of low effort meme-like "technical analysis" as a worthless angle when we could list actual use case reasons for it to moon. And compare it to other coins as well in some other way then saying they are "useless"

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Ofcourse Ethereum would be a good choice of investment in this industry. It has a sustainable market value for years and is one of the largest chain in crypto industry. But if this means overtaking the position to Bitcoin, I highly doubt. Bitcoin is the largest crypto in most aspects. One moves, other one follows. Also, I won't suggest putting all of your fund in one bucket, diversification would be more advisable. You may also try other altcoins which you think have potential. The point of diversification is to save you from risk 'coz it would be all or nothing by choosing to invest only in one token. Some tokens moves in a different manner which could give you profit than to risk it all into one.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: should be more observant towards the current circumstance of altcoin in general though.you could be accumulating eth if bad news appear your investment will become massive failure, nowadays accumulation need more carefullnes towards the news since they are the ones that have massive influenceover the fact that the tide of the market could be changing quite literally anytime.I'd say, accumulating is fine, but always know that it's always better to make an entry through accumulation only when the market is good enough that you can be sure you are at the very bottom and it will climb back up again, like when the correction is so massive you are so sure it will go back up to before.

comments.author: Wrathofcoins
comments.body: So you are a newbie who comes and say to all of our and people with ton of years here to buy ETH? and the only basis to say that its..... because its gonna go up! majestic.Its like i go to wall street and i said to them, "ey buy oil in stock markets future because its gonna be up". And yes ETH can go up.

comments.author: evichi
comments.body: In my opinion, you remarks about Ethereum is commendable especially judging from the historical performance of Ethereum. Ethereum is a great utility token built with robust attributes especially in the Defi sector. Yes, I will say Ethereum have good potential to grow in the future especially with its unique DeFi and Smart contract initiative that have impacted the crypto space in recent times. However, just as every other investment, it is still wise to thread with caution in the crypto space, and only invest what you can afford to loose. We all remember what happened to UST, so invest wisely. Remember not to put all your eggs in one basket.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on June 15, 2023, 07:11:20 PMI see ETH to become next blessing in disguise, I remember when it was around $100 people condemned it not to go anywhere within the space of a month interval ETH shuck the price in 500% increase and today is about $1800 let's watch and see ETH will create unbreakable records, channel some useless coins you have to ETH and relax in future.To be honest i would definitely like to own some ETH myself but sadly i only own a few fractions of it to pay the transaction fees, that are still way to high on the Ethereum network by the way in m opinion. That being said, for me personally, the current price of Ethereum is not really that attractive for me to really buy into it yet. As you already said, only 3 or 4 years ago or so Ethereum was even below 100$ per coin for a short period of time and it even lost his second place in the marketcap ranking to XRP if i remember correctly for a while.So to buy an asset now for 1600 $ that was below 100$ a few years ago is still not really tempting to me.

comments.author: FrozenBit
comments.body: IMO, it is true that ETH has seen a lot of growth since its inception, and without a doubt it has become one of the most popular cryptocurrencies in the market today. But it is also important to remember that investing in cryptocurrencies is a risky move, and their prices can change quickly and unpredictably. If you are planning to invest in Ethereum or any other cryptocurrency, I think you must carefully research the information before deciding to invest. All risk and potential factors should be considered, and only invest money that you can tolerate losing if there is an unforeseen change. Because of the volatility of the market, the balance between risk and return appears is very important in the investment journey.

comments.author: bangjoe
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on June 15, 2023, 07:11:20 PMI see ETH to become next blessing in disguise, I remember when it was around $100 people condemned it not to go anywhere within the space of a month interval ETH shuck the price in 500% increase and today is about $1800 let's watch and see ETH will create unbreakable records, channel some useless coins you have to ETH and relax in future.You suggest an altcoin investment without providing data that can be trusted, you only explain the description according to your assumptions, it's not enough to pressure other people to switch, I think if you want to suggest to others, of course you know about the ETH itself and you can Explain the probability that exists in the ETH in a database and / or development that they are doing right now, if only limited to assumptions, it sounds like nonsense in the eyes of ordinary people.Quote from: FrozenBit on June 16, 2023, 03:23:03 AMIMO, it is true that ETH has seen a lot of growth since its inception, and without a doubt it has become one of the most popular cryptocurrencies in the market today. But it is also important to remember that investing in cryptocurrencies is a risky move, and their prices can change quickly and unpredictably. If you are planning to invest in Ethereum or any other cryptocurrency, I think you must carefully research the information before deciding to invest. All risk and potential factors should be considered, and only invest money that you can tolerate losing if there is an unforeseen change. Because of the volatility of the market, the balance between risk and return appears is very important in the investment journey.Basically, each investment has its own risks, depending on how you control yourself and your decision in investing, investing in bitcoin alone has been said to have a risk especially in Altcoin investment.But I agree with your sentence, everything must have a deep research before investing all possibilities must be considered carefully, because this concerns the money we have, if it does not do the analysis correctly, then where the belief is to invest in the object of the object We believe that we will benefit on the future.

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on June 15, 2023, 07:11:20 PMI see ETH to become next blessing in disguise, I remember when it was around $100 people condemned it not to go anywhere within the space of a month interval ETH shuck the price in 500% increase and today is about $1800 let's watch and see ETH will create unbreakable records, channel some useless coins you have to ETH and relax in future.Ethereum is by far one of the best coins we have on the market so it is not a bad choice for those that want to increase their capital without taking a massive risk with other altcoins.That being said I think it would be a better option to buy bitcoin at first, as the bull run has the tendency to concentrate on bitcoin at the beginning while altcoins lag behind, and once you see that the altcoin market becomes alive then that would be the perfect moment to buy some ethereum.

comments.author: kaseygriffin
comments.body: Quote from: FiveG on June 15, 2023, 07:11:20 PMI see ETH to become next blessing in disguise, I remember when it was around $100 people condemned it not to go anywhere within the space of a month interval ETH shuck the price in 500% increase and today is about $1800 let's watch and see ETH will create unbreakable records, channel some useless coins you have to ETH and relax in future.You remind me of comparing it to the past until things have changed for good people repeat what was missed, it's like in real life a girl at first likes a handsome guy but because of him She was poor, so she broke up, but after 4 years seeing that guy become the president of a big company, she regrets it. And investing with ETH at different stages we can look at the story that I mentioned, I know the information problem makes us scared and nostalgic about investing in crypto, but to be more honest the volatility of this market is based mainly on news, in the face of bad news new buyers and losers will panic, but having experienced at least one bull cycle in this market automatically people will have a more pleasant view. With ETH I understand that the bigger the market is, the more its value will increase, so over time, its position has been evident over the years, altcoin competition can't beat the position. This.
